Description: LITTERING, EATING OR DRINKING IN CLASS/CHEWING IN CLASS
COPYING OF WORK OR ALLOWING OTHER LEARNER TO COPY
FORBIDDEN PLACES E.G GIRL IN BOY'S TOILET
NEGLECTING SCHOOL REPORTS/BOOKS TO BE SIGNED BY PARENTS ETC
TASK NOT SUBMITTED/CLASS WORK BOOK/ WORK NOT UP TO DATE
WRITING IN TEXT BOOK/BOOKS NOT COVERED
PLAYING SOCCER WITHOUT PRIOR CONSENT/IN THE ASSEMBLY AREA
PLAYING SOCCER WITHOUT CONSENT DURING CLASS TIME
NECKING ON SCHOOL PREMISES, SCHOOL FUNCTIONS
